description_carte: A cybernetically enhanced dragon, radiating neon energy. Feared throughout the data streams.
description_visuelle: Cyberpunk dragon, chrome scales, glowing neon blue circuitry patterns, mechanical wings, cityscape background at night, digital glitch effects, highly detailed, vibrant colors, futuristic style.

skills.name: Data Burst
skills.description: Unleashes a wave of corrupted data, dealing damage and reducing enemy defense.

skills.name: System Overload
skills.description: Temporarily boosts attack and defense, granting increased damage output and resilience.

skills.name: Firewall Breach
skills.description: Ignores a portion of enemy defense, dealing true damage with each attack.

skills.name: Glitch Storm (Ultimate)
skills.description: Summons a devastating storm of digital glitches, dealing massive damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Adaptive Armor
skills.description: Grants a shield that absorbs a portion of incoming damage.
